title: FS T206 Old Mill Cobb - PRICE REDUCTION - now $700

posts.post_title: FS T206 Old Mill Cobb - PRICE REDUCTION - now $700
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

Looking to unload my Cobb Old Mill for $700.  Thanks for taking a look!

Jimi
Price dropped to $725.  Thanks for looking!
OK, let's try $700.  Considering putting this on Net54 Auction if it doesn't sell for this.
